thread.section_title: eSURRANTY.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eSURRANTY.com | esurranty.com
thread.title: christi white

author: christi white
title: christi white
text:
I contacted Esurranty about my husbands broken cell phone screen. They rep that was helping me explained what I needed to do in detail and how to send the phone back.
The box to send the phone in came with in a couple of days with all the information on how to reset the phone to factory settings for out protection.
Sent the phones in and within a week we had our phone back, it was that simple that is why I recommend Esurranty to all my family and friends
